caption.p: HPLC chromatograms of derivatized products of standard monosaccharide mixtures and the PMP derivatives of hydrolysis products of polysaccharides from P. cocos mycelia (M) or sclerotium (S). a: Standard monosaccharide mixture; b: APS (M); c: WPS (M); d: APS (S); e: WPS (S); f: EPS (M). Peak 1: Mannose; 2: PMP; 3: Rhamnose; 4: Glucuronic acid; 5: Glucose; 6: Galactose; 7: Arabinose.
